titlestmt.titleproper: Annual Reports to the President collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Thomas Kennealy, S.J.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Tim McCabe using the OhioLINK EAD Application in 2016

did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Annual Reports to the President collection
did.abstract: This is a collection of annual reports sent to the President of Xavier University by various divisions, colleges, departments, offices, clubs and programs on campus. Each year may reflect a different mix of reporting units.

bioghist.head: History of Annual Reports to the President
bioghist.p: Beginning in the early 1950's it became the custom for every division, college, school, department, committee, office and student club or activity of the university to submit an annual report to the president in late May or early June. These reports summarized activities for the academic year just ended.

These reports were usually prepared and sent to the president by the following individuals: for University Divisions: the appropriate vice-president; for Colleges and Schools: the dean; for Academic Departments: the departmental chair; for University Committees: the committee chair; for Offices and Centers: the Director of the office or center; for Student Clubs, Activities, Publications, Fraternities: the Faculty moderator or advisor.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of reports sent to the President of Xavier University. These reports reflect activities and developments for the year within various organizational entities on campus. This collection is very incomplete. There are no reports for several years.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For other reports submitted to the President see XUA-8, the Xavier University Annual Reports collection.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Some materials may have restricted access. Please contact the archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-87, Annual Reports to the President collection, Special Collections and Archives, Xavier University, Cincinnati, Ohio.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These materials have been acquired from various sources.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.

scopecontent.p: This folder contains reports from the Department of Mathematics and Physics.
